description: Practical alpine all-arounder: the Nordwand Advanced HS Hooded Jacket Men. The hard shell jacket concentrates on mountaineers’ essential requirements: a light weight together with durability. All the key features are incorporated in a highly compressible design. The one-hand adjustable drawstring cord with Cohaesive® stoppers ensures precise adjustment of the hems and hood and can also be operated when wearing gloves. The jacket provides reliable protection from sudden changes in the weather, thanks to the waterproof, windproof and highly breathable Gore-Tex® Pro material.
name: Mammut Nordwand Advanced HS Hooded Jacket - Mens
